Your recommended portfolio allocation: **Stocks (65%)**, **Bonds (15%)**, **Cash (5%)**, **Real estate (5%)**, **Commodities (5%)**, **Cryptocurrency (3%)**, **Etfs (1%)**, **Reits (1%)**.
